Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Guardians are facing Tarik Skubal of the Detroit Tigers in Game 5, aiming to advance to the ALCS for the first time since 2013.
David Fry's seventh-inning home run in Game 4 snapped Cleveland's 11-game losing streak in elimination games dating back to 1997.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers have won 4 of their last 5 series dating back to the regular season.
Jose Ramirez is hitting.143 in the series but hit his first home run in Game 4, while Steven Kwan is batting.500 in the series after a strong Game 4 performance.
Others: The Tigers last qualified for the playoffs in 2014, while the Guardians have a strong playoff history including 6 World Series appearances.
